title: Unicode Experiments
content: [](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEji9CWabgojgA0scD6wN5RTdsCwnNO8af_JkQSWDCZSiVKBUYSihOrfgr__-k2EJVDYDKNC2B5iaOtU7IQA-GoS9TkpomBcF_Z_f1tOMxOy3kpKi_ZF2_R4pdX1GQYzZVs0LA5Q/s1600-h/iching.png)Glenn Stockton knows a lot about the I Ching and gave me a lesson today.  I'd studied The Book of Changes before, but never as deeply as Glenn has. Now I have a new reason to revisit this ancient text:  to experiment with unicode in Python.
author: Kirby Urner
